channel.title: Aws on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in Aws on Coding N Concepts

item.title: AWS Solutions Architect Associate (SAA-C02) Exam Notes
item.description: These exam notes are the result of watching 50+ hours of AWS training videos, solving 500+ of AWS exam questions, reading AWS services FAQs and White papers. Best of luck with your exam preparation!

item.title: A Step-by-Step Guide to Create an AWS Account
item.description: This step by step guide is very helpful for beginners to create a personal account with AWS.

item.title: Build Your First AWS DeepRacer Model
item.description: This step-by-step guide is helpful for beginners trying their hands on machine learning and creating their first AWS DeepRacer model.
